text: is a Japanese specialising in the high hurdles. He won a bronze medal at the 2018 World U20 Championships. He later also won a bronze medal at the 2019 Summer Universiade. His personal best in the 110 metres hurdles is 13.36 (-0.6 m/s) set in Fukuoka in 2019. ==International competitions== {| |- !colspan="6"|Representing |- |2018 |World U20 Championships |Tampere, Finland |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |110 m hurdles (99.0 cm) |13.38 |- |2019 |Universiade |Naples, Italy |bgcolor=cc9966|3rd |110 m hurdles |13.49 |} ==References== Category:2000 births Category:Living people Category:Japanese male hurdlers Category:Universiade bronze medalists for Japan Category:Universiade medalists in athletics (track and field) Category:Medalists at the 2019 Summer Universiade
title: Shunsuke Izumiya
